list.en: There was no toilet paper in the bathroom.
The TV in my room doesn't work.
Do you have a bigger room?
list.cn: 你们有大一点的房间吗?

list.en: Please show me all the bills I signed.
list.cn: 请把我签过字的账单都给我看看。

list.en: The toilet doesn't work.
Are you with the company?
Is laundry service available?
What kind of morning call would you like to have?
Please put your articles in this box and seal it.
list.cn: 请把你的物品放在这个盒子里，然后封好。

list.en: You can do it now if you like.
list.cn: 如果你愿意，现在就可以做。

list.en: What if there is any laundry damage?
list.cn: 如果有衣物损坏怎么办?

list.en: I will make up your room.
I'd like to make a reservation for this weekend.
list.cn: 我想预订这个周末的房间。

list.en: Please show me the charges.
Let me check the booking system.
I'd like to leave my luggage with you.
list.cn: 我想把行李寄存在你这里。

list.en: A lady left a message for you while you were out.
list.cn: 你不在的时候，一位女士给你留了言。

list.en: Do I have any messages?
I'm sorry, may I have a look at it?
list.cn: 对不起，我可以看一下吗?

list.en: May I do your room now?
list.cn: 我现在可以打扫您的房间吗?

list.en: Have you got any laundry?
When would you like me to call you?
list.cn: 您想让我什么时候给您打电话?

list.en: Any messages for me?
The light burned out in the bathroom.
The light in this room is too dim.
There was something wrong with the desk lamp.
The pillow cases are stained.
Would you please deposit your bag at our check room?
list.cn: 请把您的包存放在我们的寄存处好吗?

list.en: How do you like to pay your Bill?
How long do you intend to stay?
Where can I check in?
list.cn: 我在哪里办理登机手续?

list.en: There is a cover charge.
This is your claim. Check.
What is your way of payment, please?
list.cn: 请问你们用什么方式付款?

list.en: Can I rent a safety deposit box?
list.cn: 我可以租一个保险箱吗?

list.en: I'll send someone right up to have a check.
list.cn: 我马上派人去检查一下。

list.en: Could you read it for me?
I'm ready to check out.
Do you have a reservation with us?
How much is laundry service?
Here is your receipt.
I'm afraid we can't accept perishable goods.
list.cn: 恐怕我们不能接受易腐烂的货物。

list.en: It's working now.
A wake up call at seven tomorrow morning, please.
list.cn: 明天早上7点请叫我起床。

list.en: When does the cloakroom close?
I'll send someone up to help you.
We will call you up by phone.
My friend booked a room for me.
list.cn: 我的朋友为我订了一个房间。

list.en: Is this for washing?
I'm afraid it's too late for today's laundry.
list.cn: 恐怕今天洗衣服太晚了。

list.en: The next door is too noisy.
Housekeeping, may I come in?
list.cn: 客房服务员，我可以进来吗?

list.en: How many rooms would you like to book?
When did you book the room?
What kind of room would you like?
Do you want a single room or a double room?
list.cn: 您要单人间还是双人间?

list.en: Please bring us a bottle of boiled water.
list.cn: 请给我们拿一瓶开水来。

list.en: I'm afraid we can only take simple messages.
list.cn: 恐怕我们只能接受简单的留言。

list.en: I want a quiet room.
list.cn: 我想要一个安静的房间。

list.en: How would you like to settle your Bill?
May I do the turn down service for you now?
list.cn: 我现在可以为您做夜床服务吗?

list.en: Could you fill out the registration, please?
list.cn: 请您填写一下登记表好吗?

list.en: Please take my luggage downstairs.
list.cn: 请把我的行李拿到楼下。

list.en: By phone or by knocking at the door.
Please wake me up at six am.
Can I make your bed now?
list.cn: 我现在可以给你铺床了吗?

list.en: There is no hot water.
Please wake me up tomorrow morning.
There's something wrong with the air conditioner.
I will have to take some details from your passport.
list.cn: 我得从您的护照上记下一些详细信息。

list.en: Please wait just a few minutes.
I'd like to check in.
How many nights do you want to stay?
You had an urgent phone message about half an hour ago.
list.cn: 半小时前你接到一个紧急电话留言。

list.en: Do you have laundry service?
